title.rendered: “IDF Soldier’s Identity Revealed: Updates on Casualties and Injured Soldiers in Gaza Conflict”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the name of an IDF soldier whose notification has been delivered to his family:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC16122023.02584

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where details and photographs of the fallen soldiers are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in this event two reserve soldiers from the 6609 regiment, Alexandroni brigade (3), were severely and lightly injured respectively. Furthermore, an armored corps officer from the 7016 battalion, Kiryati brigade (4), was seriously injured in a combat in the southern part of the Gaza Strip.
The wounded were evacuated to the hospital and their families have been updated.
